og_question:
假设你是一位刚刚开始尝试野泳（在自然水域游泳）的都市白领，在一次意外的湖泊野泳中，你发现了一个被遗弃的水下洞穴，里面竟然有奇怪的古代壁画。这个发现让你一夜爆红，但也引来了考古学家和神秘学爱好者的质疑。为了证明自己的发现是真实的，你需要再次潜入那个危险的洞穴获取更多证据。在你正式发布探险计划前，你需要先给出3条文案，我给你一份样本内容吧。内容为：【上周，我在城郊湖泊的一次平常野泳中，意外发现了一个被淤泥半掩的水下入口。出于好奇，我屏住呼吸潜入其中，没想到竟然通向一个宽敞的半水半空洞穴。当我的头灯照亮洞壁时，我惊呆了——那上面布满了不知年代的神秘壁画，描绘着某种仪式和天体运行图。壁画使用的颜料在水中依然鲜艳如新，而图案风格既不同于我所知的任何古代文明，又带着某种难以言喻的熟悉感。更奇怪的是，洞穴深处似乎有人工开凿的痕迹，但技术又明显不属于现代。我只匆匆拍了几张模糊照片就因氧气不足而不得不返回，但那些图像已经在网上引发了轩然大波。有人说这是史前文明的证据，有人说这是外星人的遗迹，更多人则认为这是我精心策划的骗局。为了还原真相，我决定再次潜入，这一次，我会带着更专业的装备和更充分的准备。】其次，存在以下要求：你的文案内请务必不要出现"already", "really", "water", "you", "dangerous", "the", "very", "of"，但是也必须出现"archaeology", "diving", "murals", "discovery", "swimming", "mysterious", "evidence", "cave"这几个词。在文章中，要勤用修辞和排比的手法。为了输出可读性强，请你按照1.文案1
2.文案2
3.文案3
4.文案4
5.文案5
的格式输出。
question:
Assume you’re an urban professional just beginning to try wild swimming (swimming in natural waters). During an accidental lake wild swim, you discover an abandoned underwater cave with strange ancient murals. This discovery catapults you to overnight fame but also attracts skepticism from archaeologists and mysticism enthusiasts. To prove your discovery is genuine, you need to dive back into the dangerous cave for more evidence. Before officially releasing your expedition plan, you need to present 3 pieces of copy. Here is a sample content: [Last week, during a routine wild swim at a suburban lake, I accidentally discovered an underwater entrance partially covered by mud. Out of curiosity, I held my breath and dove in, unexpectedly finding a spacious semi-aquatic cave. When my headlamp illuminated the cave walls, I was stunned—mysterious murals, of unknown age, covered them, depicting some ritual and celestial diagrams. The pigments used in the murals remain vibrant in the water as if new, and the patterns are unlike any ancient civilization I know, yet carry an indescribable sense of familiarity. Even stranger, the cave’s depths seem to show signs of artificial excavation, but the technique is clearly not modern. I only managed to take a few blurry photos before oxygen ran short and I had to return, but those images have already caused quite a stir online. Some say it’s evidence of prehistoric civilization, others say it’s extraterrestrial remains, and many more believe it’s a carefully orchestrated hoax. To uncover the truth, I decided to dive again, this time with more professional equipment and thorough preparation.] Additionally, the following requirements exist: your copy must not contain "already", "really", "water", "you", "dangerous", "the", "very", "of" but must include "archaeology", "diving", "murals", "discovery", "swimming", "mysterious", "evidence", "cave". In the article, be sure to use rhetorical and parallel techniques frequently. For strong readability, please format the output as 1.Copy 1
2.Copy 2
3.Copy 3
4.Copy 4
5.Copy 5

corresponding_parts.文案: 请你按照python list的格式，一一抓取模型回复生成的每条文案。

og_question:
假设你是一位刚刚开始尝试野泳（在自然水域游泳）的都市白领，在一次意外的湖泊野泳中，你发现了一个被遗弃的水下洞穴，里面竟然有奇怪的古代壁画。这个发现让你一夜爆红，但也引来了考古学家和神秘学爱好者的质疑。为了证明自己的发现是真实的，你需要再次潜入那个危险的洞穴获取更多证据。在你正式发布探险计划前，你需要先给出3条文案，我给你一份样本内容吧。内容为：【上周，我在城郊湖泊的一次平常野泳中，意外发现了一个被淤泥半掩的水下入口。出于好奇，我屏住呼吸潜入其中，没想到竟然通向一个宽敞的半水半空洞穴。当我的头灯照亮洞壁时，我惊呆了——那上面布满了不知年代的神秘壁画，描绘着某种仪式和天体运行图。壁画使用的颜料在水中依然鲜艳如新，而图案风格既不同于我所知的任何古代文明，又带着某种难以言喻的熟悉感。更奇怪的是，洞穴深处似乎有人工开凿的痕迹，但技术又明显不属于现代。我只匆匆拍了几张模糊照片就因氧气不足而不得不返回，但那些图像已经在网上引发了轩然大波。有人说这是史前文明的证据，有人说这是外星人的遗迹，更多人则认为这是我精心策划的骗局。为了还原真相，我决定再次潜入，这一次，我会带着更专业的装备和更充分的准备。】其次，存在以下要求：你的文案内请务必不要出现"the", "very", "water", "really", "already", "of", "dangerous", "you"，但是也必须出现"cave", "mysterious", "discovery", "murals", "evidence", "archaeology", "diving", "swimming"这几个词。在文章中，要勤用修辞和排比的手法。为了输出可读性强，请你按照1.文案1
2.文案2
3.文案3
4.文案4
5.文案5
的格式输出。
question:
Assume you’re an urban professional just beginning to try wild swimming (swimming in natural waters). During an accidental lake wild swim, you discover an abandoned underwater cave with strange ancient murals. This discovery catapults you to overnight fame but also attracts skepticism from archaeologists and mysticism enthusiasts. To prove your discovery is genuine, you need to dive back into the dangerous cave for more evidence. Before officially releasing your expedition plan, you need to present 3 pieces of copy. Here is a sample content: [Last week, during a routine wild swim at a suburban lake, I accidentally discovered an underwater entrance partially covered by mud. Out of curiosity, I held my breath and dove in, unexpectedly finding a spacious semi-aquatic cave. When my headlamp illuminated the cave walls, I was stunned—mysterious murals, of unknown age, covered them, depicting some ritual and celestial diagrams. The pigments used in the murals remain vibrant in the water as if new, and the patterns are unlike any ancient civilization I know, yet carry an indescribable sense of familiarity. Even stranger, the cave’s depths seem to show signs of artificial excavation, but the technique is clearly not modern. I only managed to take a few blurry photos before oxygen ran short and I had to return, but those images have already caused quite a stir online. Some say it’s evidence of prehistoric civilization, others say it’s extraterrestrial remains, and many more believe it’s a carefully orchestrated hoax. To uncover the truth, I decided to dive again, this time with more professional equipment and thorough preparation.] Additionally, the following requirements exist: your copy must not contain "the", "very", "water", "really", "already", "of", "dangerous", "you" but must include "cave", "mysterious", "discovery", "murals", "evidence", "archaeology", "diving", "swimming". In the article, be sure to use rhetorical and parallel techniques frequently. For strong readability, please format the output as 1.Copy 1
2.Copy 2
3.Copy 3
4.Copy 4

question:
Assume you’re an urban professional just beginning to try wild swimming (swimming in natural waters). During an accidental lake wild swim, you discover an abandoned underwater cave with strange ancient murals. This discovery catapults you to overnight fame but also attracts skepticism from archaeologists and mysticism enthusiasts. To prove your discovery is genuine, you need to dive back into the dangerous cave for more evidence. Before officially releasing your expedition plan, you need to present 6 pieces of copy. Here is a sample content: [Last week, during a routine wild swim at a suburban lake, I accidentally discovered an underwater entrance partially covered by mud. Out of curiosity, I held my breath and dove in, unexpectedly finding a spacious semi-aquatic cave. When my headlamp illuminated the cave walls, I was stunned—mysterious murals, of unknown age, covered them, depicting some ritual and celestial diagrams. The pigments used in the murals remain vibrant in the water as if new, and the patterns are unlike any ancient civilization I know, yet carry an indescribable sense of familiarity. Even stranger, the cave’s depths seem to show signs of artificial excavation, but the technique is clearly not modern. I only managed to take a few blurry photos before oxygen ran short and I had to return, but those images have already caused quite a stir online. Some say it’s evidence of prehistoric civilization, others say it’s extraterrestrial remains, and many more believe it’s a carefully orchestrated hoax. To uncover the truth, I decided to dive again, this time with more professional equipment and thorough preparation.] Additionally, the following requirements exist: your copy must not contain "you", "already", "very", "the", "dangerous", "water", "really", "of" but must include "swimming", "discovery", "exploration", "archaeology", "mysterious", "diving", "murals", "cave". In the article, be sure to use rhetorical and parallel techniques frequently. For strong readability, please format the output as 1.Copy 1
2.Copy 2
3.Copy 3
4.Copy 4
5.Copy 5

og_question:
假设你是一位刚刚开始尝试野泳（在自然水域游泳）的都市白领，在一次意外的湖泊野泳中，你发现了一个被遗弃的水下洞穴，里面竟然有奇怪的古代壁画。这个发现让你一夜爆红，但也引来了考古学家和神秘学爱好者的质疑。为了证明自己的发现是真实的，你需要再次潜入那个危险的洞穴获取更多证据。在你正式发布探险计划前，你需要先给出9条文案，我给你一份样本内容吧。内容为：【上周，我在城郊湖泊的一次平常野泳中，意外发现了一个被淤泥半掩的水下入口。出于好奇，我屏住呼吸潜入其中，没想到竟然通向一个宽敞的半水半空洞穴。当我的头灯照亮洞壁时，我惊呆了——那上面布满了不知年代的神秘壁画，描绘着某种仪式和天体运行图。壁画使用的颜料在水中依然鲜艳如新，而图案风格既不同于我所知的任何古代文明，又带着某种难以言喻的熟悉感。更奇怪的是，洞穴深处似乎有人工开凿的痕迹，但技术又明显不属于现代。我只匆匆拍了几张模糊照片就因氧气不足而不得不返回，但那些图像已经在网上引发了轩然大波。有人说这是史前文明的证据，有人说这是外星人的遗迹，更多人则认为这是我精心策划的骗局。为了还原真相，我决定再次潜入，这一次，我会带着更专业的装备和更充分的准备。】其次，存在以下要求：你的文案内请务必不要出现"already", "really", "water", "you", "dangerous", "the", "very", "of"，但是也必须出现"archaeology", "diving", "murals", "discovery", "swimming", "mysterious", "evidence", "cave"这几个词。在文章中，要勤用修辞和排比的手法。为了输出可读性强，请你按照1.文案1
2.文案2

的格式输出。
